title: YungSweetRo drops major hints that Travis Scott cheated on Kylie Jenner with her
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

YungSweetRo has been offering up major clues Travis Scott was cheating on Kylie Jenner with her.

The Instagram model, whose real name is Rojean Kar, and the rapper were sharing pictures from reportedly the same locations a day apart from each other on social media.

Fans speculated YungSweetRo has been tormenting Kylie with all the little hints on her social media feed as she allegedly revelled in a secret romance with Travis behind the reality star's back.

And Rojean dropped the bombshell the cosmetics mogul, 22, had blocked her on Instagram in March, the same time Kylie suspected the father of her toddler daughter Stormi was cheating on her.

YungSweetRo and Travis have history together as incredibly close friends for at least six years.

The secret casino trip behind Kylie's back

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Travis and YungSweetRo both shared pictures from a casino in Las Vegas on July 28 this year.

In her snap, the model sucked seductively on a lollipop as she put on a raunchy display in front of one of the gaming machines.

Meanwhile, Travis threw his arms around his friend Lorenzo McCloud in his picture.

Fans speculated they were at the casino together because the carpet had the same eye-catching swirl pattern.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

But that wasn't the only incident to crop up on their social media accounts.

Travis and YungSweetRo also shared pictures from a skiing trip in snowy landscapes a day apart last year in March.

Fans were persuaded the pair had made the trip to the snow-covered slopes together.

Kylie blocked YungSweetRo amid cheating rumours

(Image: Instagram)

YungSweetRo made it public that the Keeping Up With The Kardashian star had blocked her on social media when she shared a screengrab with her fans in March.

The model had no qualms taunting the reality star as she mused over how many times a day Travis' then-girlfriend blocked and unblocked her.

She wrote: "How many times a day do you block and unblock me girl."

Clearly amused, she added four crying laughing emojis and a thinking face to her post.

At the time, it was claimed Kylie was convinced she had "evidence" her man had gone behind her back but Travis vehemently denied the rumours.

A spokesperson for Travis told ET : "Travis Scott vehemently denies he cheated on Kylie. It is not true. He did not cheat. He cancelled one show tonight because he is under the weather."

Travis' blue trainers

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

YungSweetRo shared a very raunchy snap from her bedroom but fans were distracted by the distinctive blue Jordan sneaks in the background.

Fans were quick to point out the rapper had a copy of those same blue shoes.

In the controversial snap, YungSweetRo left her silk robe open to reveal her cleavage while in the blue shoes could be seen lying on the ground in the background.

YungSweetRo and Travis have history

(Image: Instagram)

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

YungSweetRo and Travis go way back and they have been firm friends for years as Instagrams of them together date back to November 2013, nearly six years ago.

In the throwback picture uploaded in 2013, the pair put on a playful display as they both cuddled a humongous teddy bear.

The friends looked very happy in each other's company.

The Mirror has approached Kylie Jenner and Travis Scott's representatives for further comment.

The fall-out of Kylie and Travis' split

(Image: Getty Images for Netflix)

(Image: Instagram)

Kylie broke her silence on her split from Travis to deny claims she had crossed paths with her ex Tyga at his recording studio at 2am.

The mother-of-one also insisted she was on "great terms" with her ex Travis while they put their efforts into raising their daughter Stormi together.

She wrote on Twitter: "There was no '2am date with Tyga'. You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at.

"Travis and I are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi!! Our friendship and our daughter is priority."

description: Fans speculated YungSweetRo has been tormenting Kylie with all the hints on her social media feed
